text: Goe gi maanadu ina dau hagababa hagalabagau dela ne hagababa gi au gau hai hegau go Abraham, Jacob mo Isaac, bolo Goe ga haga dogologo nia madawaawa digaula, gii logo be nia heduu ala i di langi, gaa wanga ginai dau henua dela ne hagababa Kooe bolo e noho ai digaula gaa hana hua beelaa.”32.13 Genesis 22.16,17; Genesis 17.8
